name: FireSafetyTipoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Fire Safety Tip Of The Day adds a tip to help protect you, your loved ones, belongings from fire several times each week. In the United States on average Fire Departments across the country respond to more than 1000 residential fires and more than 7 people are killed and 32 are injured in fires every day. Make your family just a little safer by making Fire Safety Tip Of The Day part of your daily flash briefing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
